page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: IN NORTHFIELD MOST PEOPLE ARE CHRISTIAN AND A FEW PEOPLE ARE MUSLIM,HINDU AND JEWISH.MOST DO NOT GO TO CHURCH EVERY WEEK.MANY PEOPLE HAVE BEEN CHRISTENED. WHEN A BABY IS CHRISTENED THE VICAR PUTS HIS FINGER IN HOLY WATER AND DRAWS A CROSS ON THE BABY'S HEAD.THE HOLY WATER IS KEPT IN THE FONT WHICH IS MADE OF STONE.ABOUT HALF THE PEOPLE WERE MAR RIED IN CHURCH AND THE REST IN A REGIST ARY OFFICE.AT CHURCH THEY HAVE A FUNERAL WHEN YOU DIE.THEY PUT YOPU IN A COFFIN.THEY DIG A HOLE IN THE GRASS AND BURY YOU I8N THE SOIL.ST.LAURENCE CHURC HYARD IS FULL OF GRAVES.A HEADSTONE IS PUT UP LATER ON.MOST PEOPLE HAVE READ SOME OF THE BIBLE.SOME PEOPLE HAVE SUNG IN THE CHURCH CHOIR AT WEDDINGS AND OTH ER SERVICES.SOME PEOPLE WENT TO GUIDES, BROWNIES,CUBS OR SCOUTS WHEN YOUNG.
